page.title: 01GAZETTEER,SPARSHOLT
page.content: Our allocated area is included in the Hampshire downland.The land is mainly farm and woodland.It contains a part of the Hampshire College of Agriculture,Farley Mount Country Park and Crab Wood Nature Reserve. Sparsholt Village, 7 kilometres west north west of Winchester,lies off the A272 Stockbridge Road and countains an ancient church,a primary school,public house,cricket field, post office and rural housing,comprising both private and council housing. Roman roads ran through this area and a Roman villa excavated in 1965 resulted in a fine mosaic being unearthed and preserved in Winchester Museum.
